package:
dsl_msgs 0.0.1 Standard DSL messages including common types for various core DSL functionality. Pretty much every DSL and vehicle-specific package will ultimately depend on this. To keep the dependency tree cycle-free, this must have very few dependencies. Think long and hard before adding any.
Ian Vaughn
